title: ServiceNow Performance - Vulnerable Items Overview
description: This dashboard provides insights related to vulnerable items, such as hardware, software, configuration items, container images, or applications, that are affected by identified vulnerabilities. It links vulnerabilities to these items, enabling tracking and management of their remediation efforts.

definition.content:
The Vulnerability Response module in ServiceNow helps organizations identify, prioritize, and remediate security vulnerabilities to reduce risks and enhance system security.

This dashboard provides insights related to vulnerable items, such as hardware, software, configuration items, container images, or applications, that are affected by identified vulnerabilities. It links vulnerabilities to these items, enabling tracking and management of their remediation efforts.

**Tips:**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.


For more information, see the [ServiceNow Performance Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/servicenow_performance/).
